text:
[Verse]
Stars are shining bright
In the cool night air
Dancing left and right
With no single care

[Verse 2]
Feet on the ground
But our hearts so high
Lost and then found
Under moonlit sky

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight
We'll make it all right
With every heartbeat
We're feeling the heat

[Verse 3]
Shadows play around
As we move as one
No worries are found
Till the night is done

[Bridge]
Whispers in the dark
Promises we make
Two souls that embark
No fear of the break

[Chorus]
Under the moonlight
We'll make it all right
With every heartbeat
We're feeling the heat
title: Under the Moonlight
